elements.name: As a new user, I can create an account in myStays.com

steps.name: I click on Create account button in Sign In page
I enter valid "Testuser@gmail.com" and "Test" and "User" and "test@123" and "9567911083"
I verify the account is created with a message "User successfully created. Enter the password to proceed"
I am on Sign In page

elements.name: Verify the validation in Email address and Phone number fields when invalid values are entered

steps.name: I click on Create account button in Sign In page
I enter valid "test" and "Test" and "User" and "test@123" and "9567911083"
I click on Continue button and verify "Invalid email" is displayed

elements.name: Verify the validation in Email address and Phone number fields when invalid values are entered

steps.name: I click on Create account button in Sign In page
I enter valid "Testuser@gmail.com" and "Test" and "User" and "test@123" and "9"
I click on Continue button and verify "Please enter contact number with country code" is displayed
